page.name: Hosted Private Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Hosted Private Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Hosted Private Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Hosted Private Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [SBG3][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network & servers operation
incidents.message: Start time : 17/10/2022 22:00 UTC End time : 18/10/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : Our teams will carry out an update operation on storage equipment. This update will be performed first on the nodes in standby. Once the update is complete, a switchover will be performed to update the remaining devices. Expect a few seconds freeze of the inputs/outputs during the switchover Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment
incidents.timestamp: Oct <var data-var='date'>17</var>, <var data-var='time'>22:00</var> - Oct <var data-var='date'>18</var>, <var data-var='time'>04:12</var> UTC

incidents.message: Start time : 17/10/2022 11:49 UTC End Time : 17/10/2022 12:27 UTC Service impact : Pools weren't accessible. List of impacted pools: pcc-004362 pcc-004392 pcc-004361 pcc-004385 pcc-004387 pcc-004389 pcc-004390 Root cause : Hardware issue Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
